page.title: 09EVERGLADES AQUATIC NURSERY.
page.content: The Everglades Aquatic Nursery is situated in the middle of Baunton. It is owned by Mr. and Mrs James and has been a place where tropical fish and plants are bought and sold for 14 years. There are about 4,000 fish in stock, most come from America. The{Trigger fish is the most expensive it costs over Â£100.Everglades has the widest variety of plants in the country. There are about 300 different types, 200 are aquatic and 100 marginal. Mr. James has been interested in fish since he was 6. He used to supply {London Zoo}with snakes before he started Everglades. He has written an Encyclopaedia about water plants and hopes to write more books in the future.
